org.hibernate.ogm.datastore.mongodb

Class MongoDBProperties

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hibernate.ogm.datastore.mongodb.MongoDBProperties
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OgmProperties, DocumentStoreProperties

    public final class MongoDBProperties
extends Object
implements DocumentStoreProperties
    Properties for configuring the MongoDB datastore via persistence.xml or StandardServiceRegistryBuilder.
    Author:
    Sanne Grinovero <sanne@hibernate.org> (C) 2012 Red Hat Inc., Gunnar Morling

    • Field Detail

      • WRITE_CONCERN

        public static final String WRITE_CONCERN
        Configuration property for defining the acknowledgement of write operations. Supported values are the WriteConcernType enum or the String representations of its constants.

        Specify WriteConcernType.CUSTOM in conjunction with WRITE_CONCERN_TYPE to specify a custom WriteConcern implementation.

        Defaults to WriteConcernType.ACKNOWLEDGED.

        See Also:
        WriteConcern, Constant Field Values

      • WRITE_CONCERN_TYPE

        public static final String WRITE_CONCERN_TYPE
        Configuration property for setting a custom WriteConcern implementation. Can be given as fully-qualified class name, class-object or instance of the implementation type. If not given as instance, the specified type must have a default (no-args) constructor.

        Only takes affect if WRITE_CONCERN is set to WriteConcernType.CUSTOM.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • READ_CONCERN_TYPE

        public static final String READ_CONCERN_TYPE
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • READ_CONCERN

        public static final String READ_CONCERN
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • READ_PREFERENCE

        public static final String READ_PREFERENCE
        Configuration property for setting the read preference. Supported values are the ReadPreferenceType enum or the String representations of its constants.

        Defaults to ReadPreferenceType.PRIMARY.

        See Also:
        ReadPreference, Constant Field Values

      • ASSOCIATION_DOCUMENT_STORAGE

        public static final String ASSOCIATION_DOCUMENT_STORAGE
        Configuration property for specifying how to store association documents. Only applicable if DocumentStoreProperties.ASSOCIATIONS_STORE is set to AssociationStorageType.ASSOCIATION_DOCUMENT. Supported values are the AssociationDocumentStorageType enum or the String representations of its constants. Defaults to AssociationDocumentStorageType.GLOBAL_COLLECTION.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • AUTHENTICATION_MECHANISM

        public static final String AUTHENTICATION_MECHANISM
        Specify the authentication mechanism that MongoDB will use to authenticate the connection. Possible values are listed in AuthenticationMechanismType. BEST (default) will handshake with the server to find the best authentication mechanism.
        See Also:
        MongoCredential, Constant Field Values

      • AUTHENTICATION_DATABASE

        public static final String AUTHENTICATION_DATABASE
        Specify the authentication database to use to check the credentials.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MONGO_DRIVER_SETTINGS_PREFIX

        public static final String MONGO_DRIVER_SETTINGS_PREFIX
        Property prefix for MongoDB driver settings which needs to be passed on to the driver. Refer to the options of MongoClientOptions.Builder for a list of available properties. All string, int and boolean builder methods can be configured, eg hibernate.ogm.mongodb.driver.maxWaitTime = 1000.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
